title: Objective
description: A microscope's objective lens is a compound lens consisting of several simple lenses (elements), usually arranged along a common axis.

subCategoriesOrder.ManufacturerSpec: This is the base from which many microscope components are extended. E.g Objective, Filter etc. Provides attributes for recording common properties of these components such as Manufacturer name, Model etc. All of which are optional
subCategoriesOrder.Objective: A microscope's objective lens is a compound lens consisting of several simple lenses (elements), usually arranged along a common axis.

Name.description: A user defined name for this component.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this component.

Correction.description: The type of optical correction (i.e. chromatict, flatness, etc.) associated with this objective.

NominalMagnification.description: The magnification of the lens as specified by the manufacturer - i.e. 60 represents a 60X lens.

CalibratedMagnification.description: The magnification of the lens as measured via a calibration process- i.e. '59.987' for a 60X lens.

LensNA.description: The numerical aperture of this objective expressed as a floating point (real) number. Expected range 0.02 - 1.5.

NominalImmersionMedium.description: The immersion medium this objective is designed for.

Infinity.description: Records whether or not the objective is infinity corrected.

WorkingDistance.description: The working distance of this objective, expressed as a floating point (real) number.

Iris.description: Records whether or not the objective was fitted with an Iris.

ObjectiveFieldNumber.description: The maximal diameter of the viewfield allowed by this objective expressed in mm and measured at the intermediate image plane. NB: The field of view is influenced by the magnification and diameter of the ocular (eyepiece) field diaphragm, but also by the limits imposed by the design of the objective.

ParfocalizingDistance.description: The distance between the objective lens mounting plane and the specimen.

BackFocalPlanePosition.description: The position of the back focal plane with respect to the specimen position.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of this component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of this component

SpecsFile.description: Provide the location of a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: This is a simple multi-line comment or annotation describing this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
